comments: Nice guy - super fair. he knows his stuff but really needs to be teaching Grad Students or individuals that are in the class to learn.

Compared to the other 351 teachers this one was probably a lot easier. His lectures are pretty boring but he tries to make them as interesting as he can. His tests aren\'t that bad, he is very lenient with allowing you to take your best 40 out of 50 questions. He\'s very nice and I felt bad for him with dealing with all of the idiots in the class.
Nice guy, but has no business teaching this class.
